original_title: RuPaul & Felecia Having Fun in New York - October 18, 1984
overview: On an afternoon outing with Felecia in New York 1984, RuPaul has an incident with some homophobes at a showing of Kevin Larmee's paintings at the Avenue B Gallery and does some fun things too.
title: RuPaul & Felecia Having Fun in New York - October 18, 1984
